mapper.select: select c.cate_name cateName, v.id,v.title videoTitle,v.description,v.videopath path,v.coverpath cover, v.createtime uploadTime, u.headimg userPhoto from yx_category c right join yx_video v on c.id=v.categoryid left join yx_user u on v.userid=u.id where v.status='0' order by v.createtime desc
